flows.title: Quick Purchase of a Specific Brand Item
flows.description: A quick action-taker user who knows they want a product from a specific brand and aims to purchase it rapidly.
browser_actions: Navigate to https://www.target.com
Type 'Stanley' into the search bar and press Enter.
Click on the 'Stanley' brand link from search results, leading to https://www.target.com/b/stanley/-/N-5vhrz.
On the Stanley brand page, click on a specific product listing (e.g., 'Stanley Quencher FlowState Tumbler') to view its detail page.
Click the 'Add to Cart' button on the product detail page.
Click the 'View Cart' or 'Go to Cart' button to proceed to https://www.target.com/cart?prehydrateclick=true.

flows.title: Detailed Research of a Product Category with Filters
flows.description: A detailed researcher who is looking for a specific type of clothing (women's jeans) and wants to filter by price and sort by newest arrivals.
user_goals: Find women's jeans within a specific price range.
browser_actions: Navigate to https://www.target.com
Click on the 'Categories' link in the main navigation (https://www.target.com/c/shop-all-categories/-/N-5xsxf?prehydrateClick=true).
From the categories page, click on the 'Women' category link (https://www.target.com/c/women/-/N-5xtd3).
On the Women's page, click on the 'Jeans' subcategory link (https://www.target.com/c/jeans-women-s-clothing/-/N-5xtc8Z1vs54Zo267dZ54zprZe6p1m).
Locate the 'Price' filter section on the Women's Jeans page and select the range '$20-$100' (this updates the URL to include '?maxprice=100&minprice=20&type=products').
Locate the 'Sort By' dropdown menu and select 'Newest'.
Scroll down the page to browse the filtered and sorted products.

flows.title: Discovering Deals in a Specific Home Category
flows.description: A price-conscious user actively looking for discounts and sales on kitchen and dining items.
user_goals: Find discounted kitchen and dining products.
browser_actions: Navigate to https://www.target.com
Click on the 'Deals' link in the main navigation (https://www.target.com/c/weekly-deals/-/N-4xw74?prehydrateClick=true).
On the 'Weekly Deals' page, locate and click on a banner or link for 'Kitchen & Dining Deals' (https://www.target.com/c/kitchen-dining/all-deals/-/N-hz89jZakkos).
Browse through the list of kitchen and dining products on sale.
Click on a specific product listing (e.g., product with ID 445416468, leading to https://www.target.com/pl/445416468) to view its details and discount information.

flows.title: Returning Visitor Checking Loyalty Program Benefits
flows.description: A returning customer who wants to understand or review the benefits of their Target loyalty programs, specifically Target Circle and its associated card.
user_goals: Compare Target Circle with Target Circle Card benefits.
browser_actions: Navigate to https://www.target.com
Click on the 'Target Circle™' link in the top header navigation (https://www.target.com/circle).
Read the overview and benefits described on the Target Circle landing page.
Locate and click on the 'Target Circle™ Card' link (https://www.target.com/circlecard) to learn about additional card-specific benefits.
Review the details of the Target Circle Card program.

flows.title: Mobile User Browsing for Seasonal Inspiration
flows.description: A user on a mobile device with limited time, looking for quick inspiration related to an upcoming seasonal event like Halloween.
user_goals: Get ideas for Halloween costumes or decorations.
Quickly see what Halloween products are available.
browser_actions: Navigate to https://www.target.com
Scroll down the homepage to quickly scan for prominent seasonal promotions or banners.
Click on the 'Halloween' promotional link or banner (https://www.target.com/c/halloween/-/N-5xt2o).
Scroll through the 'Halloween' hub page, scanning for different categories like costumes, decor, or candy, and general themes.
